features: COOKWARE SET INCLUDES: 1qt saucepan pot with lid and 2qt saucepan pot with lid
REINFORCED WITH DIAMONDS: Metal utensil safe, GreenPan's original diamond-infused nonstick coating offers remarkable durability, balanced heating, and effortless cleanup.
TOXIN-FREE: GreenPan's healthy ceramic nonstick coating is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium for worry-free meals.
ULTRA-TOUGH ARMORED BODIES: The hard anodized construction makes these pans extra scratch-resistant and perfect for everyday use.
BUILT FOR OVEN COOKING: Oven and broiler safe up to 600°F.
DURABLE GLASS LIDS: Easily monitor your food without sacrificing heat, oven safe up to 425°F.
ERGONOMIC GRIP: The matte stainless steel handles are riveted to keep you comfortable and in command.
VERSATILE DESIGN: Suitable for all stovetops, except induction.
DISHWASHER SAFE: Wipe messes clean or toss in the dishwasher for easy cleaning.
body.description: Exclusive! The Prime Midnight collection brings together flawless function and style. These pots and pans are crafted from durable hard anodized aluminum for maximum strength and scratch protection. The set’s metal utensil safe Thermolon healthy ceramic nonstick coating is reinforced with diamonds for extra durability and effortless performance. Manufactured without PFAS, PFOA, lead, or cadmium, our nonstick coating won't release toxic fumes, even if it’s accidentally overheated. Drip-free edges allow for easy pouring and the polished stainless steel handles offer a secure grip. Dishwasher safe. Oven safe up to 600°F, lids up to 425˚F. The set includes: 1-quart and 2-quart saucepan with lids; 5-quart stockpot with lid; 8-quart stockpot with lid; 8" and 9.5" frypans; 12’’ frypan with lid; stainless steel steamer; 3-quart sauté pan with lid. Limited lifetime warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GREENPAN PRIME MIDNIGHT CERAMIC NONSTICK 2-PIECE SAUCEPAN SET, AMAZON EXCLUSIVE

METAL UTENSIL SAFE PRIME MIDNIGHT—TOUGH & DURABLE Exclusive! The Prime Midnight collection is a powerful way to start cooking healthy. Crafted from durable hard anodized aluminum for maximum strength and scratch protection, this set features a metal utensil safe ceramic nonstick coating offers effortless performance. Manufactured without PFAS, PFOA, lead or cadmium, our ceramic nonstick lets you focus on the food for effortless cooking. Drip-free edges allow for easy pouring and the polished stainless steel handle gives you a secure grip. TOXIN-FREE: FREE OF PFAS & PFOA HEALTHY CERAMIC NONSTICK GreenPan's signature ceramic nonstick coating is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead and cadmium so you can make any meal healthier. EXTRA SCRATCH-RESISTANT HARD ANODIZED Versatile and durable, this pair is crafted with hard anodized bodies for strength with scratch resistance. OVEN & BROILER SAFE POLISHED STAINLESS STEEL HANDLE The riveted, ergonomic design of this durable handle gives you a secure and comfortable grip. It's also oven safe up to 600°F. WIPES & RINSES CLEAN EASY CLEANUP GreenPan's signature ceramic nonstick coating gives you wipe clean ease and is dishwasher safe for those big messes.

Previous page HARD ANODIZED BODIES Scratch-resistant and dishwasher safe CERAMIC NONSTICK Diamond-reinforced ceramic nonstick is metal utensil safe and free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium POLISHED HANDLES Shiny stainless steel handles are ergonomic and oven safe TEMPERED GLASS LID Keep an eye on your food without sacrificing heat. Oven safe up to 425°F. Next page POTS & PANS THAT ADD SLEEK STYLE TO YOUR STOVETOP 1 Body 2 Coating 3 Handle 4 Lid
COOKWARE MADE TO MAKE IT HEALTHY

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got a greenpan pot over a year ago and I love it & use it all the time! I’m so glad I bought these 2 new additions - it’s perfect to have a couple smaller options instead of one semi-large pot to cook in. We have used them probably a dozen times so far and washed them in the dishwasher & they are holding up beautifully! Much better than the older model original version pan I have. These heat up really fast & evenly, easy to clean & look great. I highly recommend!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great pots!
reviews.reviewText: I am gradually replacing my old pots and pans with these Teflon-free, easy-to-clean, very excellent pots and pans. Worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic non stick pots!!
reviews.reviewText: These are the best we have ever had and at a great price. Will be buying some skillets from this same brand. So easy to clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My kitchen is non-stick again
reviews.reviewText: These pots and pans clean beautifully I've only had him a couple weeks but for right now I love them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good quality product
reviews.reviewText: The pans are sturdy and BOA free. In addition, the price was affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Nonstick Small Pots
reviews.reviewText: These come with well fitting lids and are exactly as advertised. The heat distribution is extremely good and they clean very easily. The coating seems durable, so far, and they are easy to use. I like that they came with recommendations on how to use them to keep the surface working correctly. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars so far so good
reviews.reviewText: very good quality.. nonstick surface is very good..heats evenly and quickly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: These pans aren’t too heavy but aren’t so lightweight that they tip on my gas burners. They clean up easily.

I love this brand a lot. I have bought a series of Green Pans in the past and have been using them a lot. These 2 pots that I bought in Amazon still bring happiness for me in the kitchen. Be very careful not to use them on a high heat if you want to keep them lasting for a long time.
Excellent choice. Heats up quickly and super easy to clean. Recycled old pots and pans. No where else to go, excellent purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Está increíble el set aunque la chiquita es miniatura
reviews.reviewText: Lástima que la chiquita es mini, o sea casi inservible

I bought this set because I wanted the 1 qt sauce pan. It’s a perfect size for boiling eggs and make chai for 2.Handles tend to get warm but not too hot.I wish the handles are gold and inside pots are white/brighter color.
